title: Why do I have to wait in fountain for mana to refill?
body:
That is fking absurd. 

I'm starting to think Riot just wings a lot of things and waits a few patches before they actually know what to do. Example is when they made grievous wounds for self heal only... WTF? and then changes it back.

Now for sure as HELL I don't trust them for removing green wards and mana pots. They haven't got a fucking clue what they're doing over there. As a support I used to ward at least 3 bushes to prevent ganks. Pink ward doesn't do anything when you're against an aggressive lane. The trinket ward cooldown is way too long for the duration they last.

Why the hell do you have to wait at least 7 seconds in fountain on an EMPTY mana bar for it to refill? It doesn't even increase overtime. Energy champs just get a slap on the wrist?? They don't have to wait for anything. That is 100000000% FUCKING ABSURD!@!!!!!!@!@!#!#@!$#@%$#@%$#W%$ HOO HA HE HA #%@#W%@#W #@% ICE CREAM CONE #@%@#%!$!$!@$ !!!!

Probably a rager, all i can say is he's whining about stupid things like how they removed clutter on items that were not very useful, too overpowered or just plain a schmick that could grant certain champions a overpowered gag.

Kinda like how in Aram and with potions, they cut down the mana recovery a bit to reduce the indefinite sustain power in ARAM and potion items with 'mana recovery', which could carry some champions strongly enough before their first buy which could grant them a huge damage spike with ease, especially if they manage to avoid dying(even if they didnt get any kills) or got a number of kills thanks to help from team mates or plain good juke playing against a enemy champion who is either reckless or not smart enough to know when its a good time to stay back or get behind the turret and recall home to buy before they get killed.

as for the Stealth ward, thats basically what a yellow trinket is these days. :/ Probably had its consumable version removed to begin with because people hoarded them instead of pinks so they could have ridiculous map vision and you couldn't really just plain and simple destroy it if it functions the same as a yellow trinket does at the moment.

Anyway yeah definitely a troll if he speaks jibberish with random words at the end. down'voting him for polluting the board with retarded complaint speak.
I think Llama was referring to me lol
I don't know why you're suddenly complaining about this when I don't think they've ever changed it and if they have I don't think they have this season, let alone this patch.

there are mana rengeration items, items that increase your mana pool and you can mana regen with runes and masteries. you even have the option of the secert stash mastery where when you buy hp pots it turns into the biscuit that gives you a small mana refil. they also have items like {{item:2031}} {{item:2033}} {{item:2032}}  they made the changes to the game to make it not as easy to stock up on mana pots and spam abilities to do damage, now you have to think and plan out your abilities which a person who can mana their mana compared to a person who doesnt clearly have a stronger ability to master their champs and game. 

as for champs who use energy they have no way to buy items to replenish their spent energy. their energy pool is way smaller then a champ with mana.
